name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Python Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Django**, and cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Expert in designing scalable systems and implementing **CI/CD** processes with tools such as **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **CloudFormation**. Proven track record in backend development using **Node.js** and proficient in microservices architectures and **gRPC**. 
Additionally skilled in database technologies with hands-on experience in both relational and schema-less databases. Strong background in software delivery for high-performance applications, coupled with experience in compliance-driven development and ensuring adherence to industry standards.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Django** to design and build scalable backend solutions for health and finance applications, integrating with **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for cloud services and infrastructure management.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines with tools such as **Terraform**, **CloudFormation**, and **GitHub Actions** to automate testing and deployment processes, ensuring robust and scalable delivery methodologies with a focus on availability and performance.
Engineered microservices architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to support load balancing and fault tolerance, optimizing deployment strategies for high-traffic environments with over **10,000** concurrent users.
Developed and maintained **relational databases** such as PostgreSQL and **schema-less databases** like MongoDB to optimize data retrieval and storage for transactions exceeding **1 million** per day.
Designed and exposed APIs via **GraphQL** and **gRPC** to facilitate seamless data communication between services, leading to a **30%** reduction in latency for end-user requests.
Led the adoption of **scalable system design** principles when transitioning from monolithic systems, enhancing application responsiveness and maintainability.
Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate backend services, ensuring compatibility with modern frameworks and enhancing user experience by implementing features that decreased the loading time by **40%**.
Established security measures and compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS in backend systems, safeguarding sensitive data and ensuring regulatory adherence.
Facilitated effective cross-team communication by leading technical discussions and workshops focused on the implementation of best practices in software design and architecture.

Utilized **Python** (Django) to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, resulting in a **30%** increase in system scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Engineered robust backend services using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) in conjunction with **GraphQL** to seamlessly integrate with front-end applications built with **React** (18), Vue 3, and Next.js, achieving delivery of features in **40%** reduced time.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, enabling automated deployments and increasing the overall deployment efficiency by **50%**.
Designed and deployed an event-driven architecture leveraging **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, which facilitated asynchronous communication across critical workflows, thereby improving transaction processing times by **25%**.
Developed ETL pipelines using **Python** and **Azure Data Factory** to efficiently ingest financial data from both internal and third-party sources, concurrently supporting batch and real-time processing.
Created and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, improving proactive fraud detection by identifying suspicious activity based on **95%** accuracy in user behavior and transaction patterns.
Integrated real-time credit scoring and transaction classification into backend services using MLflow and Airflow, enhancing the predictive capabilities of financial systems.

• Developed scalable backend services utilizing **Python** and **Django**, ensuring smooth operation and performance across high-demand environments, resulting in a systems performance improvement of **30%**.
• Leveraged **Node.js** frameworks like Express for asynchronous processing, achieving a **25%** reduction in response times in key APIs.
• Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, promoting efficient software delivery and reducing deployment times by **40%**.
• Employed **AWS** and **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, streamlining setup and management of cloud resources, leading to cost reductions of approximately **20%**.
• Managed data storage solutions with **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, facilitating efficient access and transaction handling across a distributed environment for over **1M** daily users.
• Collaborated on service architecture using **GraphQL** and **gRPC** for efficient data fetching and communication between services, enhancing performance and reducing data over-fetching issues.
• Introduced best practices for database optimization and design patterns, significantly enhancing the read and write operations on **schema-less databases**.
• Implemented robust security protocols, applying **RBAC** and **OAuth 2.0** for user authentication and authorization, ensuring data protection and compliance with regulations.
• Utilized **CloudFormation** to automate the provisioning of application resources, decreasing infrastructure setup time by **50%** while increasing reliability.
• Contributed to team knowledge sharing on **Go** language support, thus broadening skill sets and improving overall project outcomes.
